Name: GTEC015 - GovTech Change of Address Occupier
Output_template:
{"method":"POST","url":"http://{govtechpath}","show_headers":"yes","headers":"{"user":"{govtechuser}", "password":"{govtechpassword}"}","payloadType":"XML","payload":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<rev:FirmstepCTMove xmlns:rev="http://www.govtechsolutions.co.uk/schema/revenues" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.govtechsolutions.co.uk/schema/revenues file:///C:/Users/Russ/Google%20Drive/XML/govtech%20schemas/GSL_Firmstep_CTMove_v0.3.xsd">
	<rev:Header>
		<rev:Authority>{govtechauthoritycode}</rev:Authority>
		<rev:DocumentSource>{form_name}</rev:DocumentSource>
		<rev:DocumentReference>{reference}</rev:DocumentReference>
		<rev:SubmissionDate>{today}</rev:SubmissionDate>
		<rev:Environment>LIVE</rev:Environment> <!--I don't always test, but when I do it's in LIVE or DEV or TEST-->
		<rev:Route>DIRECT</rev:Route> <!-- DIRECT = open, PORTAL = authenticated-->
		<rev:PDF>
			<rev:Document>{prev_data_64}</rev:Document>
		</rev:PDF>
		<rev:FormType>CTaxMove</rev:FormType>
	</rev:Header>
	<rev:Contact>
		<rev:Name>
			<rev:Title>{Title}</rev:Title>
			<rev:Forename>{firstName_out}</rev:Forename>
			<rev:OtherNames>{proc_MiddleName}</rev:OtherNames>
			<rev:Surname>{Surname}</rev:Surname>
		</rev:Name>
		<rev:EmailAddress>{Email_Address}</rev:EmailAddress>
		<rev:TelephoneNumber>
			<!--@af:if({Phone_Number}!='') -->
				{Phone_Number}
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({Phone_Number}='') -->
				{Mobile_Number}
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:TelephoneNumber><!--must have tel, email, or both-->
	</rev:Contact>
	<rev:MoveType>{govTechMoveType}</rev:MoveType>
	<!--@af:if({changeType}='in') -->
	<rev:OldAddressOutOfAreaDetails>
		<rev:OldAddress>
				<rev:Line1>{fromAddress/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{fromAddress/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{fromAddress/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{fromAddress/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({fromAddress/upPostcode_out}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{fromAddress/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({fromAddress/upPostcode_out}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:OldAddress>
		<rev:PreviouslyLivedInArea>{Previously}</rev:PreviouslyLivedInArea>
		<!--optional  - This is the Previous Address within the council's area if the Contact has ever lived here before.-->
		<!--@af:if({Previously}='true') -->
		<rev:PreviousAddressInArea>
			<rev:Address>
				<rev:Line1>{PrevPortAddr01/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{PrevPortAddr01/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{PrevPortAddr01/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{PrevPortAddr01/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({PrevPortAddr01/upPostcode_out}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{PrevPortAddr01/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({PrevPortAddr01/upPostcode_out}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			</rev:Address>
			<!--<rev:PropertyRef>blah</rev:PropertyRef>-->
			<!--@af:if({PrevPortAddr01/uprn_out}!='') -->
				<rev:UPRN>{PrevPortAddr01/uprn_out}</rev:UPRN>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:PreviousAddressInArea>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
	</rev:OldAddressOutOfAreaDetails>
	<!--@endaf:if end-->
	<!--@af:if({changeType}!='in') -->
	<rev:OldAddressInAreaDetails>
		<rev:Property>
			<rev:Address>
				<rev:Line1>{fromAddress/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{fromAddress/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{fromAddress/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{fromAddress/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({fromAddress/upPostcode_out}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{fromAddress/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({fromAddress/upPostcode_out}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			</rev:Address>
			<!--<rev:PropertyRef>blah</rev:PropertyRef>-->
			<!--@af:if({fromAddress/uprn_out}!='') -->
				<rev:UPRN>{fromAddress/uprn_out}</rev:UPRN>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:Property>
		<!--@af:if({oldCTaxRef}!='') -->
			<rev:CouncilTaxAccountNumber>{oldCTaxRef}</rev:CouncilTaxAccountNumber>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<rev:WasOwnerOrTenantAtOldAddress>{isThePersonMoving}</rev:WasOwnerOrTenantAtOldAddress>
		<!--@af:if({isThePersonMoving}='Tenant') -->
		<rev:TenantInformation>
			<rev:Furnishing>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/PropFurnishedUn}</rev:Furnishing>
			<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancyP1/isTheMoveOutDate}='false') -->
				<rev:TenancyEndDate>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/tenancyEnd}</rev:TenancyEndDate>
				<rev:WillMoveOutOnTenancyEndDate>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/isTheMoveOutDate}</rev:WillMoveOutOnTenancyEndDate>
				<rev:MoveOutDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:MoveOutDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancyP1/isTheMoveOutDate}='true') -->
				<rev:TenancyEndDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:TenancyEndDate>
				<rev:WillMoveOutOnTenancyEndDate>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/isTheMoveOutDate}</rev:WillMoveOutOnTenancyEndDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<rev:AllOccupantsVacatingProperty>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/allVacating}</rev:AllOccupantsVacatingProperty>
			<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancyP1/allVacating}='false') -->
			<!--@af:repeat({remainingTenants1}) -->
				<rev:AdultStaying>
					<rev:Title>{remainingTenants1/title}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{remainingTenants1/firstName}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:Surname>{remainingTenants1/lastName}</rev:Surname>
				</rev:AdultStaying>
			<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<rev:Landlord>
						<rev:Role>{oldPropertyTenancy/DetailsLandAgent}</rev:Role>
						<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/owner_company}!='') -->
							<rev:CompanyName>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_company}</rev:CompanyName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/owner_lastName}!='') -->
							<rev:PersonName>
								<rev:Title>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_title}</rev:Title>
								<rev:Forename>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_firstName}</rev:Forename>
								<rev:Surname>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_lastName}</rev:Surname>
							</rev:PersonName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/owner_email}!='') -->
							<rev:EmailAddress>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_email}</rev:EmailAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/owner_telephone}!='') -->
							<rev:TelephoneNumber>{oldPropertyTenancy/owner_telephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/textOut2}!='') -->
						<rev:Address>
							<rev:Line1>{oldPropertyTenancy/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
							<rev:Line2>{oldPropertyTenancy/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
							<rev:Line3>{oldPropertyTenancy/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
							<rev:Line4>{oldPropertyTenancy/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
							<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/upPostcode_out}!='') -->
								<rev:Postcode>{oldPropertyTenancy/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
							<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancy/upPostcode_out}='') -->
								<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
							<!--@endaf:if end-->
						</rev:Address>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
			</rev:Landlord>
		</rev:TenantInformation>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({isThePersonMoving}='Owner') -->
		<rev:OwnerInformation>
			<!--@af:if({whatIsHappeningTo}='sell') -->
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>true</rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>
				<!--@af:if({newOwner/isThisCompDate}='false') -->
					<rev:CompletionDate>{newOwner/CompletionDate}</rev:CompletionDate>
					<rev:WillMoveOutOnCompletionDate>false</rev:WillMoveOutOnCompletionDate>
					<rev:MoveOutDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:MoveOutDate>
					<rev:PropertyToBeUnfurnished>{newOwner/OldPropUnfurnished}</rev:PropertyToBeUnfurnished>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newOwner/isThisCompDate}='true') -->
					<rev:CompletionDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:CompletionDate>
					<rev:WillMoveOutOnCompletionDate>true</rev:WillMoveOutOnCompletionDate>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newOwner/sol_recorded}!='') -->
					<rev:Solicitor>
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/sol_company}!='') -->
						<rev:CompanyName>{newOwner/sol_company}</rev:CompanyName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/sol_lastName}!='') -->
							<rev:PersonName>
								<rev:Title>{newOwner/sol_title}</rev:Title>
								<rev:Forename>{newOwner/sol_firstName}</rev:Forename>
								<rev:Surname>{newOwner/sol_lastName}</rev:Surname>
							</rev:PersonName>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/sol_email}!='') -->
							<rev:EmailAddress>{newOwner/sol_email}</rev:EmailAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/sol_telephone}!='') -->
							<rev:TelephoneNumber>{newOwner/sol_telephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</rev:Solicitor>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newOwner/buy_lastName}!='') -->
					<rev:Buyer>
						<rev:Name>
								<rev:Title>{newOwner/buy_title}</rev:Title>
								<rev:Forename>{newOwner/buy_firstName}</rev:Forename>
								<rev:Surname>{newOwner/buy_lastName}</rev:Surname>
						</rev:Name>
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/buy_email}!='') -->
						<rev:EmailAddress>{newOwner/buy_email}</rev:EmailAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({newOwner/buy_telephone}!='') -->
						<rev:TelephoneNumber>{newOwner/buy_telephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if('do not use'='stop') -->
						<rev:Address>
							<rev:Line1/>
							<rev:Line2/>
							<rev:Line3/>
							<rev:Line4/>
							<rev:Postcode/>
							<!--<rev:NonStdPostcode/> end-->
						</rev:Address>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</rev:Buyer>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({whatIsHappeningTo}='rent') -->
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>false</rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>
				<rev:MoveOutDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:MoveOutDate>
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>true</rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>
				<rev:Furnishing>{OP_NewTenant/PropFurnished}</rev:Furnishing>
				<rev:TenancyStartDate>{OP_NewTenant/tenancyStartDate}</rev:TenancyStartDate>
				<!--@af:repeat({newTenants1}) -->
					<rev:Tenant>
						<rev:Name>
							<rev:Title>{newTenants1/title}</rev:Title>
							<rev:Forename>{newTenants1/firstName}</rev:Forename>
							<rev:Surname>{newTenants1/lastName}</rev:Surname>						
						</rev:Name>
						<!--@af:if({newTenants/email}!='') -->
							<rev:EmailAddress>{newTenants1/email}</rev:EmailAddress>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
						<!--@af:if({newTenants/telephone}!='') -->
							<rev:TelephoneNumber>{newTenants1/telephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber>
						<!--@endaf:if end-->
					</rev:Tenant>
				<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({whatIsHappeningTo}='stay') -->
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>false</rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>
				<rev:MoveOutDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:MoveOutDate>
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>false</rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>
				<rev:ExistingAdultsToRemain>true</rev:ExistingAdultsToRemain>
				<!--@af:repeat({remainingTenants}) -->
					<rev:AdultStaying>
						<rev:Title>{remainingTenants/title}</rev:Title>
						<rev:Forename>{remainingTenants/firstName}</rev:Forename>
						<rev:Surname>{remainingTenants/lastName}</rev:Surname>
					</rev:AdultStaying>
				<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({whatIsHappeningTo}='nothing') -->
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>false</rev:PropertyIsBeingSold>
				<rev:MoveOutDate>{dateYouMoveOut}</rev:MoveOutDate>
				<rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>false</rev:PropertyIsBeingRented>
				<rev:ExistingAdultsToRemain>false</rev:ExistingAdultsToRemain>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:OwnerInformation>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
	</rev:OldAddressInAreaDetails>
	<!--@endaf:if end-->
	<!--@af:if({changeType}='out') -->
	<rev:NewAddressOutOfAreaDetails>
			<rev:Line1>{newAddressDe/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
			<rev:Line2>{newAddressDe/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
			<rev:Line3>{newAddressDe/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
			<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/overseas}!='yes') -->
				<rev:Line4>{newAddressDe/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/upPostcode}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{newAddressDe/upPostcode}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/upPostcode}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/overseas}='yes') -->
				<rev:Line4>{newAddressDe/textOut4} {newAddressDe/naCountry}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/zipPostcode}!='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>{newAddressDe/zipPostcode}</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/zipPostcode}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({oldPropertyTenancyP1/moveToSame}!='') -->
				<rev:EveryoneMovingToSameNewAddress>{oldPropertyTenancyP1/moveToSame}</rev:EveryoneMovingToSameNewAddress>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
	</rev:NewAddressOutOfAreaDetails>	
	<!--@endaf:if end-->
	<!--@af:if({changeType}!='out') -->	
	<rev:NewAddressInAreaDetails>
		<rev:Property>
			<rev:Address>
				<rev:Line1>{newAddressDe/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{newAddressDe/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{newAddressDe/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{newAddressDe/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/upPostcode}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{newAddressDe/upPostcode}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/upPostcode}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			</rev:Address>
			<!--<rev:PropertyRef>blah</rev:PropertyRef>-->
			<!--@af:if({newAddressDe/na_uprn}!='') -->
				<rev:UPRN>{newAddressDe/na_uprn}</rev:UPRN>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:Property>
		<rev:WillBeOwnerOrTenantAtNewAddress>{movingToNewPropAs}</rev:WillBeOwnerOrTenantAtNewAddress><!-- Owner or Tenant-->
		<rev:TotalNumberOfOccupantsOver18>{NumOver18}</rev:TotalNumberOfOccupantsOver18>
		<!--need this or OwnerInformation, not both -->
		<!--@af:if({movingToNewPropAs}='Tenant') -->
		<rev:TenantInformation> 
			<rev:Furnishing>{isThePropertyLet}</rev:Furnishing> <!--[choice of Furnished|PartFurnished|Unfurnished]-->
			<!--@af:if({isTenancyStart}='true') -->
			<rev:TenancyStartDate>{moveDate}</rev:TenancyStartDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({isTenancyStart}='false') -->
			<rev:TenancyStartDate>{tenancyStart}</rev:TenancyStartDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<rev:WillMoveInOnTenancyStartDate>{isTenancyStart}</rev:WillMoveInOnTenancyStartDate>
			<!--@af:if({isTenancyStart}='false') -->
			<rev:MoveInDate>{moveDate}</rev:MoveInDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<rev:Landlord>
				<rev:Role>{tenantLaAg/DetailsLandAgent}</rev:Role>
				<rev:CompanyName>{tenantLaAg/LACompany}</rev:CompanyName> <!--[must supply company, person or both. companyname max 25chars]-->
				<rev:PersonName>
					<rev:Title>{tenantLaAg/LATitle}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{tenantLaAg/LAFirstName}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:OtherNames></rev:OtherNames>
					<rev:Surname>{tenantLaAg/LALastName}</rev:Surname>
				</rev:PersonName>
				<rev:EmailAddress>{tenantLaAg/LAEmail}</rev:EmailAddress>
				<rev:TelephoneNumber>{tenantLaAg/LATelephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber> <!--optional-->
				<rev:Address>
					<rev:Line1>{tenantLaAg/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
					<rev:Line2>{tenantLaAg/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
					<rev:Line3>{tenantLaAg/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
					<rev:Line4>{tenantLaAg/textOut4}</rev:Line4>
					<!--@af:if({tenantLaAg/upPostcode}!='') -->
					<rev:Postcode>{tenantLaAg/upPostcode}</rev:Postcode>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
					<!--@af:if({tenantLaAg/upPostcode}='') -->
					<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
					<!--@endaf:if end-->
				</rev:Address>
			</rev:Landlord>
		</rev:TenantInformation>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({movingToNewPropAs}='Owner') -->
		<rev:OwnerInformation>
			<!--@af:if({isCompDate}='true') -->
			<rev:CompletionDate>{moveDate2}</rev:CompletionDate>
			<rev:WillMoveInOnCompletionDate>true</rev:WillMoveInOnCompletionDate>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({isCompDate}='false') -->
			<rev:CompletionDate>{completionDate}</rev:CompletionDate>
			<rev:WillMoveInOnCompletionDate>false</rev:WillMoveInOnCompletionDate>
				<rev:DoYouKnowMoveInDate>true</rev:DoYouKnowMoveInDate><!-- required if WillMoveInOnCompletionDate is false-->
				<rev:MoveInDate>{moveDate2}</rev:MoveInDate><!--required if DoYouKnowMoveInDate is true-->
				<rev:PropertyToBeUnfurnished>{propertyUnFurnished}</rev:PropertyToBeUnfurnished><!--required if WillMoveInOnCompletionDate is false-->
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:OwnerInformation>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({prevOwnerDetails/doYouHaveTheCont}='Yes') -->
		<rev:PreviousOwnerOrTenant><!-- optional -->
			<rev:Name>
					<rev:Title>{prevOwnerDetails/POTitle}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{prevOwnerDetails/POFirstName}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:OtherNames></rev:OtherNames>
					<rev:Surname>{prevOwnerDetails/POLastName}</rev:Surname>
			</rev:Name>
			<rev:EmailAddress>{prevOwnerDetails/POEmail}</rev:EmailAddress>
			<rev:TelephoneNumber>{prevOwnerDetails/POTelephone}</rev:TelephoneNumber> 
			<rev:Address>
				<rev:Line1>{prevOwnerDetails/textOut1}</rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2>{prevOwnerDetails/textOut2}</rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line3>{prevOwnerDetails/textOut3}</rev:Line3>
				<rev:Line4>{prevOwnerDetails/textOut4}</rev:Line4><!-- optional -->
				<!--@af:if({prevOwnerDetails/upPostcode}!='') -->
				<rev:Postcode>{prevOwnerDetails/upPostcode_out}</rev:Postcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
				<!--@af:if({prevaddress/upPostcode_out}='') -->
				<rev:NonStdPostcode>no postcode</rev:NonStdPostcode>
				<!--@endaf:if end-->
			</rev:Address>
		</rev:PreviousOwnerOrTenant>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if('not using'='yes') -->
		<rev:PreviousOwnerOrTenant><!-- optional -->
			<rev:Name>
					<rev:Title>{PTTitle}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{PTFirstName}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:OtherNames></rev:OtherNames>
					<rev:Surname>{PTLastName}</rev:Surname>
			</rev:Name>
			<rev:EmailAddress>{PTEmail}</rev:EmailAddress>
			<rev:TelephoneNumber>{PTTel}</rev:TelephoneNumber> 
<!--			<rev:Address>
				<rev:Line1></rev:Line1>
				<rev:Line2></rev:Line2>
				<rev:Line4></rev:Line4>
				<rev:Line5></rev:Line5>
				<rev:Postcode></rev:Postcode>		
			</rev:Address>-->
		</rev:PreviousOwnerOrTenant>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({nNumOver18}!='0') test NumOver18 {nNumOver18}-->
		<!--@af:repeat({newOccupants}) Start Repeat-->
		<!--@af:if({newOccupants/legalInterest}!='') check legal interest -->
		  <rev:OtherOccupantOver18><!--repeat this section for every >18 occupant-->
			<rev:Name>
					<rev:Title>{newOccupants/TitleO}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{newOccupants/First_NameO}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:OtherNames></rev:OtherNames>
					<rev:Surname>{newOccupants/SurnameO}</rev:Surname>
			</rev:Name>
			<rev:LegalInterest>{newOccupants/legalInterest}</rev:LegalInterest><!--Joint Owner|Joint Tenant|None|Owner|Tenant-->
			<rev:RelationshipToContact>{newOccupants/relation}</rev:RelationshipToContact><!--Civil Partner|Other|Partner|Spouse-->
		  </rev:OtherOccupantOver18>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({nNumA16or17}!='0') check if there are new occupants any aged 16 or 17-->
		<!--@af:repeat({newOccupants}) -->
		<!--@af:if({newOccupants/age}='Under') -->
		<rev:OtherOccupantsAged16Or17><!--repeat this section for every 16 or 17yrs occupant-->
			<rev:Name>
					<rev:Title>{newOccupants/TitleO}</rev:Title>
					<rev:Forename>{newOccupants/First_NameO}</rev:Forename>
					<rev:OtherNames></rev:OtherNames>
					<rev:Surname>{newOccupants/SurnameO}</rev:Surname>
			</rev:Name>
			<rev:DateOfBirth>{newOccupants/Date_Of_Birth}</rev:DateOfBirth>
		</rev:OtherOccupantsAged16Or17>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!-- @endaf:repeat endR-->
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		
		
		<!--@af:if({applyForSinglePer}='true') -->
		<rev:ApplyForSingleOccupierDiscount>true</rev:ApplyForSingleOccupierDiscount>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<!--@af:if({applyForSinglePer}!='true') -->
		<rev:ApplyForSingleOccupierDiscount>false</rev:ApplyForSingleOccupierDiscount>
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
	<!--@af:if({setupDD/areMultipleSignatu}='no') -->
	<rev:DirectDebitDetails>
		<rev:PreferredNumberOfInstalments>{setupDD/noOfInstallments}</rev:PreferredNumberOfInstalments> <!--installments per year -->
		<!--@af:if({setupDD/DayOfMonth}!='') -->
		<rev:PaymentDay>{setupDD/DayOfMonth}</rev:PaymentDay><!--day of month for payments, optional-->
		<!--@endaf:if end-->
		<rev:BankAccountDetails>
			<rev:AccountHolderName>{setupDD/BankAccountHolder}</rev:AccountHolderName>
			<rev:AccountNumber>{setupDD/accountNumber}</rev:AccountNumber>
			<rev:SortCode>{setupDD/sortCodeNoSpaces}</rev:SortCode>
			<!--@af:if({setupDD/areMultipleSignatu}='yes') -->
			<rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>true</rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
			<!--@af:if({setupDD/areMultipleSignatu}='no') -->
			<rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>false</rev:MoreThanOneSignatureRequired>
			<!--@endaf:if end-->
		</rev:BankAccountDetails>
		<rev:OriginatorIdentificationNumber>{govtechoriginatorid}</rev:OriginatorIdentificationNumber>
	</rev:DirectDebitDetails>
	<!--@endaf:if end-->
	</rev:NewAddressInAreaDetails>
	<!--@endaf:if end-->
	<rev:DeclarationCompleted>true</rev:DeclarationCompleted>
</rev:FirmstepCTMove>","responseType":"XML","strip_namespaces":"1","path_to_values":"","fields":"","xslt_stylesheet":"","results_page_columns":"","secure_fields_db_http":""}
